titles.title: A resolution authorizing the use of official office funds to purchase the pocket version of the Constitution of the United States.
A resolution authorizing the use of official office funds to purchase the pocket version of the Constitution of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Authorizes the use of the Senate contingent fund to purchase copies of the pocket version of the U.S. Constitution.
